            <string language="en">How to fly a Boeing 747</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment voler un Boeing 747</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como voar um Boeing 747</string>

            <string language="en">122 questions about the Boeing 747-100/200, arranged into random 20 question quizzes.</string>
